description: Straight forward interface, works well on KDE, tagging is fast, and does everything I need
while editing id3 tags is nowadays common feature in almost all music players, this one is quite nice to use - i especially like how simple is to add/edit a thumbnail.
Extensive functionality, intuitive interface, and "just works"

I haven't had lots of time to investigate everything this app can do but it sure looks promising. I've been a long-time user of Puddletag but ever since they started distributing it through the Snap Store, you can't access music files from external drives. All part of the "genius" design of Snap files.

So I'll stick with Kid3 for now. I may go back in my archives and install the Puddletag .deb file from an older version in case Kid3 doesn't have the features I got used to using in Puddletag. But so far, it looks very good.
summary: Seems to do everything you'd ever want it to

description: I was able to remove Comments and do stuff easily that I was pulling my hair out trying to figure out with Musicbrainz Picard. Thank you so much. Great tool for Tagging collections.
Once you figure out how this app works, it's super easy to use. Don't waste your time with Picard - I lost a whole morning trying to figure it out, without success.
This is a simple, intuitive and feature-rich app to edit and work with audio & video file tags. It works very well. I recommend it.

It looked very promising, but when I went to 'Open' a file, the dialog box was wider than my Desktop, (default Ubuntu 22.04.01) and I couldn't select/change the files. Had to kill it with a crowbar.  Seems like a minor bug, but a flat tire will still keep the car from rolling.
I used to use mp3tag, and this programme fills it's place nicely

I also had that problem, but I found a way around this using these steps:

1. Press escape key to go back to main screen
2. Take the window out of maximised mode
3. Open up the menu item you require
4. You should now be able to move the dialog left or right 
5. You will now be able to do want you need

Kid3 has been the best program for changing tags I have used even on Windoze. Five star rating if the extra large dialogs can be fixed.
Working with this app is very simple but also very useful
When I was on windows I used mp3tag which worked great, so very pleased to find a great app which works just as well. I have tried a few but Kid3 seems to manage everything that I need very well.

Overall a really helpful program, but the Snap version has been badly implemented. 
Trying to use any of the qml scripts triggers the error Directory not found.
summary: Snap Version has incorrect qml Script Path Names

description: Does the job flawless, I recommend it
Das Fenster zum Öffnen von Dateien lässt sich nicht anpassen und passt nicht auf meinen Laptop Bildschirm! Deinstalliert
the best tag-editor under linux
Un gran editor de etiquetas para archivos de audio. Una interfaz sencilla, intuitiva y muy fácil de utilizar.
no arranca esta version ni de deb ni flatpak, si lo instalas en synaptic si que funcion pero es la version anterior no la nueva
summary: no arranca en debian esta version

description: Va perfecto en Ubuntu esta ultima version, gracias...
summary: En Ubuntu SI funciona bien esta ultima version

description: Un gran editor de etiquetas de audio. Muy configurable.
me sirvio en steamos
Un projet à maintenir ...
summary: Cet outil a répondu à mes attentes

description: Однако, интерфейс пользователя очень непривычный...

Вставить обложку и отредактировать теги можно сразу, достаточно выделить все треки. Название придётся редактировать вручную. Его легко брать тут же из названия файла, нажав клавишу «F2» для переименования и скопировав название. Потом вставляем в первую строку тега, редактируем, убираем лишнее и сохраняем. Очень удобное приложение.
